meanings.sent1: He socked the ball with all his might.
meanings.sent2: She socked the bully in self-defense.
meanings.sent3: The baseball player socked the ball out of the park.
meanings.sent4: The storm socked the coast with powerful winds.
meanings.sent5: The boxer socked his opponent with a knockout punch.

meanings.sent1: She had warm, socked feet on the cold winter night.
meanings.sent2: The socked toddler ran around the house happily.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked adorable with its socked paws.
meanings.sent4: The socked man slipped on the shiny floor.
meanings.sent5: The socked dog wagged its tail in excitement.
